news.title: Trump tells Fed's Lisa Cook she's fired; she says 'he has no authority to do so'
news.summary: President Donald Trump's removal of a Federal Reserve governor could end up being challenged at the Supreme Court. Trump removed Fed Gov. Jerome Powell from his post.

news.title: Trump Pentagon is 'thinking' about taking equity stakes in defense contractors, says Lutnick
news.summary: The Trump administration is "thinking about" whether the U.S. should take stakes in top defense contractors, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said.

news.title: Frontier Airlines goes after struggling rival Spirit's customers with 20 new routes
news.summary: Frontier Airlines has gotten more aggressive for Spirit customers. The move comes as its rival is on shakier financial footing. Frontier Airlines is a subsidiary of Alaska Airlines.

news.title: EchoStar stock skyrockets 80% on AT&T deal to buy wireless spectrum for $23 billion
news.summary: EchoStar said the deal will also help resolve an FCC inquiry over its use of certain spectrum licenses, including some that were sought by Elon Musk's SpaceX.

news.title: Eli Lilly’s weight loss pill orforglipron clears its latest trial, paving way for approval
news.summary: Eli Lilly now has the clinical trial data required to start filing for approvals of the drug for chronic weight management with global regulators. Eli Lilly has been developing the drug since the 1980s.

news.title: Lilly obesity-pill trial results find a warmer reception on Wall Street this time around
news.summary: Eli Lilly says it will now move "with urgency" toward getting regulatory approval for orforglipron. Pharmaceutical giant Eli Lilly said it will move “with urgency’ toward getting approval for the drug.

news.title: ‘They knocked her down and started biting’: My mother, 84, was viciously attacked by her neighbor’s two dogs. Do we sue?
news.summary: "The police, ambulance and animal control were all called immediately. The dogs were removed and put down," police said. "The dogs were taken to a local animal shelter and the dogs were put down"

news.title: Durable-goods orders retreat due to Boeing, but details look stronger
news.summary: AI-driven spending is offsetting weakness from tariff uncertainty, analysts say. The U.S. economy is expected to grow at a faster rate this year than last year.

news.title: A tax-refund surge is coming. How JPMorgan expects it to shift economy and markets.
news.summary: JPMorgan Asset Management’s chief global strategist. An even bigger crop of tax refunds is coming in early 2026, he says.

news.title: Betting markets don’t believe that Trump will succeed in ousting Fed’s Lisa Cook
news.summary: Betting markets don’t see a high chance that President Donald Trump will manage to oust Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook. Trump’s announcement late Monday that he had fired her while accusing her of mortgage fraud.
